entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
